name: Vestige (itch) (Beer Spill Studios)
description:
In Vestige you will explore a fractured world, while searching for your brother. This world is filled with terrifying monsters which you will have fight in order to survive! You will be in control of a vehicle called The Scavenger and upgrading it will be a crucial part of your survival!

Demo:
In this early version of the game we are looking for feedback on how it feels to control The Scavenger and also how it feels to attack with it. 



Current Content:
- The Scavenger
- Destructable Targets
- Aiming practice

Future Content:
- Monsters
- New Level
- Upgrades
- Exchangable parts for The Scavenger
- Story

After playing the game, please tell us what you think in the comment section and consider taking this 2-minute survey, thanks! You're input is greatly appreciated towards the development of this game!
https://forms.gle/dqk6wSCm4PveonXy9
